fullDescription.intro: Shifts the time zone by changing the time zone of cells which already have a time zone to a default time zone and shifting their times according to it.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the time zones of the included columns will be shifted.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

ports.outPort: Output table with shifted time zone.
